species.name: smoliv
descriptions: It protects itself from enemies by emitting oil from the fruit on its head. This oil is bitter and astringent enough to make someone flinch.
This Pokémon converts nutrients into oil, which it stores in the fruit on its head. It can easily go a whole week without eating or drinking.

abilities.name: early-bird
abilities.effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

abilities.name: harvest
abilities.effect: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.
